meta.description: Optimize the production of regular and tempered glass panes to maximize profit given machine time constraints.

sets.name: GLASS_TYPES
sets.description: Types of glass panes produced by the factory.

sets.name: MACHINES
sets.description: Machines used in the production process.

params.name: time_per_pane
params.description: Time required on each machine to produce one pane of each glass type.

params.name: profit_per_pane
params.description: Profit earned from selling one pane of each glass type.

params.name: max_time_per_machine
params.description: Maximum available time per machine per day.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of panes to produce for each type of glass.

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.description: Maximize the total profit from selling glass panes.

constraints.name: heating_time_constraint
constraints.description: Total heating machine time must not exceed available time.

constraints.name: cooling_time_constraint
constraints.description: Total cooling machine time must not exceed available time.
